chess.gui.board
Class ChessBoard

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  chess.gui.board.ChessBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Constants, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
Direct Known Subclasses:
ChessBoardMain, ChessBoardSetup, ChessBoardSmallView
public class ChessBoard
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements Constants

ChessBoard is the super class of ChessBoardMain and ChessBoardSmallView. It takes care of storing board and game values.

Author:
Arvydas Bancewicz
See Also:
Serialized Form
